about_the_game:
Overview:

Prepare yourself for a journey as Hemlock, a dedicated carrier. Set on the vast landmass of Isle Island, navigate through the large Maze of Jordan to deliver a crucial message about the infamous Triad's impending attack on the prosperous New City of Jordan. This maze-based adventure offers a unique blend of exploration, strategy, and storytelling.

Key Features:

- Power-Ups: Discover various power-ups to aid your progression through the maze.

- Traps: Avoid, complete, or destroy numerous traps as you navigate the maze.

- Narrative: Uncover a rich narrative that unfolds as you progress, with Hemlock's mission at the heart of the story.

- Power-Up Chaining: Strategically combine power-ups for enhanced effects and a unique gameplay experience.

- Dynamic Weather: Experience changing weather conditions that add to the immersive atmosphere of the game.

Detailed Description:

You play as Hemlock, tasked with delivering a vital message navigating through the Maze of Jordan. Explore interesting and mysterious locations within the maze, each with its own secrets to uncover.

As you traverse the maze, collect power-ups that can be chained together for powerful effects, helping you overcome obstacles and progress further. The dynamic weather system adds another layer of challenge and immersion, making each playthrough a unique experience.

Will you successfully navigate the maze, deliver the message, and save City of Jordan from the Triad's planned attack?

name: Dull Skies -1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon R7 265
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Prepare yourself for a journey as Hemlock, a dedicated carrier. navigate through the large Maze of Jordan to deliver a crucial message. This maze-based adventure offers a unique blend of exploration, strategy, and storytelling.
